meta.name: developer-growth-analysis
meta.title: Developer Growth Analysis
meta.description: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and areas for improvement, curates relevant learning resources from HackerNews, and sends a personalized growth report to Slack DMs

original_definition.skill_description: Analyzes your recent Claude Code chat history to identify coding patterns, development gaps, and areas for improvement, curates relevant learning resources from HackerNews, and automatically sends a personalized growth report to your Slack DMs.

actions.name: Read Chat History
actions.description: Access chat history from ~/.claude/history.jsonl for past 24-48 hours

actions.name: Analyze Work Patterns
actions.description: Extract projects, technologies, problem types, challenges, approach patterns

actions.name: Identify Improvement Areas
actions.description: Find 3-5 specific, evidence-based, actionable improvement areas

actions.name: Generate Report
actions.description: Create comprehensive growth report with summary, improvements, strengths, actions

actions.name: Search Learning Resources
actions.description: Search HackerNews for articles relevant to each improvement area

actions.name: Send Report to Slack
actions.description: Send formatted report to user's Slack DMs via Rube MCP

rules.name: Check Slack Connection
rules.condition_expression: Slack is connected via Rube MCP

directives.name: Growth Analysis Complete
directives.description: Full report generated with resources and sent to Slack

directives.name: Improvement Criteria
directives.description: Improvements must be specific, evidence-based, actionable, and prioritized

directives.name: Report Structure
directives.description: Sections: Work Summary, Improvement Areas (prioritized), Strengths Observed, Action Items, Curated Learning Resources

execution_paths.expected_outcome: Personalized report with resources sent to Slack
